timeline.bodyText: How about OrderedNode or OrderedTypeDefNode? Suggested the former since this precedence APIs seem generic enough that they can be used for other nodes as well, if needed
timeline.author: pubudu91

+package org.ballerinalang.model.tree;
+
+/**
+ * Interface representing type definitions that are sortable using their dependencies to each other.
+ *
+ * @since 2.0
+ */
+public interface SortableTypeDefNode extends Node {

Merge pull request #25299 from rdhananjaya/object-classes

Add class definition initial cut
Fix checkstyle issues
Remove unused attributes from BLangObjectCtorExpr
Add init method checks for object-ctor-expression

Fix taintedness propagation of object functions

Previously if the receiver is tainted any member function
would return tainted value regardless of receivers involment
in the return value. Now if the receiver is tainted and
the taint table says that when receiver is tainted the return
value is tainted, then we mark the return value of a member
tainted.
Add annotation decl support for class attachpoint
Remove balos as cannot disable on old parser
Clean up the code
